mapper.select: select aptCode,aptName,dongCode,dongName,buildYear,jibun,lat,lng,img from houseInfo where dongCode like concat(#{dongCode},"%");

select info.aptCode,aptName,dongCode,dongName,buildYear,jibun,lat,lng,img, if(hl.userid= #{userId},true,false) as liked from houseInfo info left outer join houseinfolike hl on hl.aptCode = info.aptCode where dongCode like concat(#{dongCode},"%") order by aptCode ;
